みんな、聞いてくれ！\nこんな状況だからこそ、言わなきゃいけないことがあるんだっ:
Everyone, listen to me!
It's precisely because I'm in this situation that there's something I have to say!!
そう言って、俺は大きく肺に空気を吸い込む。: Saying that, I take a deep breath of air into my lungs.
頼む……！ もし、無事に帰れたら、\n俺と……！！ 付き合ってくれぇええええ――:
Please...! If I make it home safely,
Me...!! Go out with meeeeeee!!
何故こんな状況になったのか。\nそれを説明するには、少し時間の針を巻き戻さねばな:
Why did we end up in this situation?
In order to explain that, I had to rewind the clock a little.
意識が覚醒すると同時にベッドから跳ね起きる。: As soon as I wake up, I jump out of bed.
ハァ……ハァ……なんだ、この汗は……: Hah... hah... What's with this sweat...?
何か恐ろしい夢を見ていた気がするけど……\nそれがどんな内容だったのか思い出せな:
I feel like I was having a terrible dream...
I couldn't remember what it was about.
（正直自分で言っておきながら、記憶がないせいで\nそれがどういうことなのか何もわ:
(Honestly, I’m the one who said it, but because I don’t have any memories
I don't know what that means.)
でも――拭えぬ確信と、\nただ漠然とした不安と焦りだけが残っていた。:
But—with an unwipeable conviction,
All that remained was a vague sense of unease and impatience.
……早く記憶を取り戻さないとな。: ...I need to get my memories back soon.
なんて、独り言をつぶやいていると――: As I was muttering to myself――
ほんとですよ！！\nなんでボクをもっと使ってくれないんですかぁー！:
It's true!!
Why won't you use me more?!
いや、だって、そこまで頼るタイミングないし……: No, I mean, I don't have the timing to rely on her that much...
実際、今のところピコの持つ情報はネット検索以上のものはなく、\nそれ以外のことで:
As a matter of fact, at the moment, there was nothing more information Pico had than an online search
I don't have a chance to rely on them because they're struggling with something else.
しくしく……いいですよぉ……\nどうせボクなんかポンコツ無能役立たずＡＩですから:
*sniffle*... It's okay...
I'm just an incompetent, useless AI...
そこまで卑下しなくても……\nせめて『ポンコツ無能役立たず』くらいにしておけよ…:
You don't have to be so downtrodden...
At the very least, let's just call him an incompetent, useless piece of shit...
何も削ってないですよね！？: You didn't cut anything, did you?!
ははは、まあ、冗談はさておき、たまにこうして話相手に\nなってくれるだけで、俺と:
Hahaha, well, jokes aside, sometimes I talk to people like this.
It's enough for me just to be like that.
これは本音だ。実際さっきまでの不安や焦りが、\nどこかへ霧散した気がする。:
This is how I really feel. In fact, the anxiety and impatience I felt earlier...
I feel like it's dispersed somewhere.
（まあ、『ナビ』ＡＩとしてでいうと、なんとも言えんが……）: (Well, as a 'Navi' AI, I can't say for sure...)
さて、まずは着替えて、\nこの汗をどうにかするか……:
Now then, let's get changed first.
Do something about this sweat...
ズボンを下ろそうとした体勢で七彩と見つめあう。: Shichika and I stared at each other, trying to pull our pants down.
ど、どうして%usernameusernameuserna%さんが\n可愛らしく:
Wh-Why is %usernameusernamesuserna%san
Can you scream cutely?!
着替えているのは俺で、見られているのも俺だ。: I was the one changing clothes, and I was also the one being watched.
つまり、ここは俺が悲鳴をあげるべきなのでは？: In other words, shouldn't I be the one screaming here?
そもそもだな、なんでノックもしないで入ってくるんだ。: In the first place, why did she come in without knocking?
下着姿の俺にそんなに興味があるのか？\nアマツにはノックの文化がないのか？:
Are you that interested in me in my underwear?
Amatsu doesn't have a culture of knocking?
ち、違いますわよ！\n玄関にはチャイムもございますっ。:
N-No, that's not it!
There's also a bell at the entrance.
ただ急いでお話ししなければならないことが、\nあったものですから、その……:
There's just something I have to tell you in a hurry.
It was there, so, um...
ノックもチャイムもすっ飛ばして、\n部屋に飛び込んできたと。:
I skipped both the knock and the bell.
She rushed into the room.
このままではお話しもできませんから、\n早く着替えてくださいませ！:
At this rate, we won't be able to talk, so...
Please hurry up and change!
んー、わかった。\n少し待っててくれ。:
Hmm, all right.
Wait a minute.
って、わたくしの前で脱がないでくださいましっ！: Wait, please don't strip in front of me!
教室にはシリウスシュガーの面々が集まっていた。: The members of Sirius Sugaru had gathered in the classroom.
生徒会命令によらない探索や訓練で消費する消耗品の補充は\n各チームが保有する資金:
Refilling expendables in exploration and training that didn’t follow the student council’s orders
It is to be done with the funds each team has.
多くの場合、チームの資金はリーダーが預かっており、\nシリウスシュガーでは七彩が:
In most cases, the team’s funds were in the hands of the leader
In Sirius Sugaru, Shichika was in charge.
だがカオスメイデン戦に向けた訓練に集中してもらうため\n一時的に俺が担当すること:
But in order to get them to focus on their training for the Chaos Maiden War...
I'll be temporarily in charge.
公式戦が終わり、七彩に管理を戻したところで\n資金が枯渇しているのに気が付いたと:
The official match was over, and we’d just returned the management to Shichika
That meant he’d noticed that his funds were depleted.
訓練のために景気よく推進剤や弾薬を消費しましたでしょう？: You spent a lot of propellant and ammunition for training, didn't you?
そうだな。それに見合うだけチームの戦力が向上したと思うが。: That's right. I think the team's strength has improved in proportion to that.
それだけでなく、\nメイズ探索で得られた報酬を個人に還元していましたでしょう？:
Not only that,
You were returning the rewards you got from searching for Maze to the individual, weren't you?
結果的にチームワークとは何かを知ることができただろ。: As a result, you learned what teamwork is.
……うぅ、どちらもその通りなので反論できません。: ...Ugh, both of them are right, so I can't argue.
で、ですが……例えば採掘効率の悪いメイズ浅層で、\n大量の弾薬や燃料を消費するこ:
B-But... For example, in the shallow layer of Mayse, where mining efficiency is low
Spending a large amount of ammunition and fuel is unprofitable.
撃破数稼ぐために派手に使いまくったもんねぇ。: You used it all up to make a killing, didn't you?
あの、まだ前の報酬残っているので、返還しましょうか？: Um, I still have my previous reward, so should I return it to you?
今から『戻して』は難しいかも……: It might be hard to 'return' it now...
たしかに、すでに支払ったものを戻せというのも筋が通りませんわね。: It certainly doesn't make any sense for us to return what we've already paid.
ですが、このままですとチームを維持することも困難になりますわ。: However, it will be difficult to maintain the team at this rate.
そんなことは最初から織り込み済みだから心配するな。: Don't worry, I've already factored in all of that from the start.
そもそも公式戦で勝てなかったらチームは解散だっただろ。\nだからあれは必要な先行:
If we hadn't won the official match in the first place, the team would have been disbanded.
So that was a necessary advance investment.
優先すべきはチームを戦える状態に持っていくことだった。\n資金不足については存続:
Their priority was to bring the team to a state where they could fight.
As for the lack of funds, we can think about it after it's decided that it will continue to exist.
先行投資ということは先の展望があるということですわね？: If you're investing in the future, that means you have a future ahead of you, doesn't it?
これからどうされるおつもりなのか、\n方針を聞かせていただけますかしら。:
I don't know what you're planning to do from now on,
Can you tell me your plan?
公式戦に勝ったことで、シリウスシュガーはより深い階層まで\n探索できるようになっ:
Winning the official battle had led Sirius Sugaru to a deeper floor
You can explore now, right?
……あ。そうしたら採掘でいいもの掘れちゃう？: ...Ah. If I do that, will I be able to dig something good in the mines?
新たな階層を調べられるのも魅力的だね。: It's fascinating to be able to investigate a new floor.
深い階層は、それだけメイズシフターも強力になるけど……: The deeper floors, the more powerful the maise shifters become, but...
カオスメイデンにも勝てた今のわたくし達なら、\n十分対応できる……ということです:
We were able to beat Chaos Maiden now, so...
We'll be able to deal with them well enough... I suppose.
一時的にチームが資金不足に陥っても、\nより効率的に資金を回収できるようになれば:
Even if the team was temporarily short on funds,
There would be no problem if they could recover the funds more efficiently.
ここまですべて計算通りだった。: Everything up to this point had gone according to plan.
というわけで、しばらくは減った資金を回復させるために、\n採掘を重視する方針でい:
And so, in order to recover the funds that had been reduced for a while...
Let's focus on mining.
深い階層へ行けるようになれば、俺やみんなのメイズ適性も伸びる。\nより潜っていけ:
Once we’re able to go to the deeper floors, my and everyone’s mace aptitudes will increase.
If I dive deeper, I might be able to find some clues about my memories.
わかりましたわ。それではさっそくスマートデバイスから、\nメイズ探索の許可申請を:
Understood. Then let's start with the smart device.
Requesting permission to search for Mayse.
この先も撃破数に応じて報酬が変わるのかな？: I wonder if the reward will change depending on how many we defeat in the future, too?
まずはチームの資金確保が優先ですよ。: Securing the team's funds takes priority first.
活躍した分だけ報酬が増えるのは魅力だけどねー。: The more active you are, the more you'll get paid. That's what makes you so attractive, though.
もう手持ちがないんだろ？\nつい無駄遣いしちゃうところがクソガキなんだよなぁ。:
You don't have anything else to do, do you?
You're such a shitty brat for wasting so much money.
誰がクソガキだってぇ！？\nそれに無駄遣いなんてしてないし！:
Who are you calling a shitty kid?!
And I'm not wasting any money!
探索の申請が却下されてしまいましたわ……: The request to investigate has been rejected...
